ValidationRule.description: Only Hearing Officers can change a Case Violation to Dismissed, Affirmed, or Modified. Updated permission set so that applied payments
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR((ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Dismissed")), (ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Affirmed")),(ISPICKVAL( Status__c, "Modified")))&& ISCHANGED( Status__c)&&($Profile.Name <> "WCA User" )
